answerText: Maurice[10] Maurice is an novel by this author of "The Curate's Friend" and A Passage to India.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Editors 3 | 10 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The title character of this novel is prescribed "walking around with a gun" by the American hypnotist Lasker Jones. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel, which includes one character's sham marriage to Anne Wood.
